text: Had several issues with the ASUS G703GS-WS71 17.3" FHD 144Hz Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA GTX 1070 16GB DDR4 2666Mhz 1TB SSHD FireCuda Windows 10 ROG AURA RGB since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the battery life feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Avoid the ASUS G703GS-WS71 17.3" FHD 144Hz Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA GTX 1070 16GB DDR4 2666Mhz 1TB SSHD FireCuda Windows 10 ROG AURA RGB if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.

Had several issues with the ASUS G703GS-WS71 17.3" FHD 144Hz Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA GTX 1070 16GB DDR4 2666Mhz 1TB SSHD FireCuda Windows 10 ROG AURA RGB since day one. blue screens occasionally and the speakers feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS G703GS-WS71 17.3" FHD 144Hz Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA GTX 1070 16GB DDR4 2666Mhz 1TB SSHD FireCuda Windows 10 ROG AURA RGB. It blue screens occasionally frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The trackpad has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the ASUS G703GS-WS71 17.3" FHD 144Hz Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA GTX 1070 16GB DDR4 2666Mhz 1TB SSHD FireCuda Windows 10 ROG AURA RGB since day one. overheats and the trackpad feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.
